pvz.unit

Class OffensivePlant

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • pvz.level.SerializableObservable
        • pvz.unit.Unit
          • pvz.unit.PerishableUnit
            • pvz.unit.Plant
              • pvz.unit.OffensivePlant
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PeaShooterPlant

    public abstract class OffensivePlant
extends Plant
    This class is the abstract superclass for all plant types which shoot a projectile at zombies. The default type of bullet to shoot is a peabullet (Bullet#Type), but extending classes can specify their own. Plants should be be directly instantiated but instead use the static method PlantFactory.makePlant(pvz.unit.Plant.Type, pvz.level.Square).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
